EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Data Science Tech Workshops_Q3-416.SWMY - NYC AM/PM
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry you couldn’t attend Pivotal’s Data Science Technical Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/data-science-workshops]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Sorry you could not attend the Pivotal Data Science Technical Workshop in New York on October 20th.
You can still have a taste of how to start your Data Science journey by leveraging your SQL skills and utilizing Pivotal Greenplum and Apache MADlib (incubating). We invite you to join the Greenplum Database community <[[http://greenplum.org/]]> where you can download the Pivotal Greenplum Sandbox (which includes Apache MADlib (incubating)) and access helpful tutorials.
Also, take advantage of our big data and analytics resources including:
- The workshop presentation <[[http://d1fto35gcfffzn.cloudfront.net/slides/Pivotal_DS_Workshop.pdf]]> <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/tag/data-science]]> - Blog posts related to Pivotal Data Science <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/tag/data-science]]> - eBook: Shaping the Future of Data Warehousing through Open Source Software <[[http://pivotal.io/shaping-the-future-of-data-warehousing-through-open-source-software]]> - Case study: Aridhia Powers Next-Gen Clinical Analytics Platform with Pivotal Greenplum <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/case-study/powering-the-next-generation-of-clinical-and-translational-informatics]]> - Webinar on-demand: Insights to Action: How to Transform Your Business with Smart Applications <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/how-to-transform-your-business-with-smart-applications]]>
If you would like more information or have any questions about big data and data science, submit your question and contact information at pivotal.io/contact <[[mailto:pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Data Science Team
